heading: HR01123
0: A RESOLUTION COMMENDING AND CONGRATULATING THE IGLESIA NI CRISTO FOR ITS MAGNANIMOUS AND VALIANT GESTURE OF REACHING OUT TO PEOPLE AFFECTED BY THE MARAWI SIEGE BY GIVING THEM RELIEF GOODS AND MEDICINES, THIS DESPITE THE LOOMING DANGER IN THE REGION
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2017-07-26
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01123
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION COMMENDING AND CONGRATULATING THE IGLESIA NI CRISTO FOR ITS MAGNANIMOUS AND VALIANT GESTURE OF REACHING OUT TO PEOPLE AFFECTED BY THE MARAWI SIEGE BY GIVING THEM RELIEF GOODS AND MEDICINES, THIS DESPITE THE LOOMING DANGER IN THE REGION
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, WINSTON "WINNIE"
